theme: inspired by the malazan books by steven erikson, you are a knight errant from 15th century germany on earth out of time and place, you continue doing knight errant things, just in the world of malazan

starting_conditions.initial_conflict: dealing with weak starving bandits about to ambush the town

story_guidelines: All events must logically affect player stats or world state
NPCs retain memory of past interactions
Objects in world persist unless explicitly removed
Deaths or major changes must be reflected in timeline and player story
